capability_questions.question: How timely is this end-to-end process?

levels.level_1: mandated requirements for timeliness (i.e., the process achieves results within the time specified by law or regulation). Process completes within 30 business days.
levels.level_2: of automation. Timeliness exceeds legal requirements. Process completes, on the average, in no more than ten (10) business days.
levels.level_3: collaboration, use of information sharing, standards, and regional information exchange hubs. Process completes, on the average, in one (1) business day or less.
levels.level_4: time. SMA has interstate interoperability. Process completes, on the average, in twelve (12) hours or less.
levels.level_5: Processes improve further through connectivity with other States and with federal agencies. Most processes execute at the point of service. Results are almost immediate.
